app.title: Cachy
app.backupButtonTitle: Create a backup of all settings and data
app.restoreButtonTitle: Restore data from a backup file
app.restoreConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to restore from this backup? All your current settings, presets, and journal entries will be overwritten. This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.totalTradeMetricsTooltip: Overview of the most important key figures for the entire trade.
dashboard.riskPerTradeCurrencyTooltip: The absolute amount of money you risk at most.
dashboard.totalFeesTooltip: The estimated total cost for this trade.
dashboard.profitAtBestTargetTooltip: Hypothetical profit if the ENTIRE position were closed at the best take-profit target. This is not the planned total profit.
dashboard.weightedRRTooltip: The average risk-reward ratio of all partial sales.
dashboard.totalNetProfitTooltip: The accumulated net profit from all partial sales.
dashboard.soldPositionTooltip: The total percentage of the position sold.
dashboard.netProfitTooltip: The estimated profit for this partial sale.
dashboard.priceChangeTooltip: The percentage price movement from entry.
dashboard.returnOnCapitalTooltip: The percentage profit in relation to the capital.
dashboard.partialVolumeTooltip: The quantity of units for this partial sale.

takeProfitTargets.tooltip: Here you can see the calculated key figures for each of your partial take-profit targets.

summaryResults.maxNetLossTooltip: The maximum amount you can lose on this trade, including all fees.
summaryResults.profitAtBestTargetTooltip: Hypothetical profit if the ENTIRE position were closed at the best take-profit target. This is not the planned total profit.
summaryResults.requiredMarginTooltip: The capital blocked from your account for this trade.
summaryResults.estimatedLiquidationPriceTooltip: DANGER: This is a highly simplified estimate and does NOT include maintenance margin. Your actual liquidation price will be less favorable. Always refer to your exchange's liquidation price.
summaryResults.breakEvenPriceTooltip: The estimated price to exit the entire position without profit or loss. This is not accurate for partial take-profits as the true break-even price changes with each sale.

dashboard.promptForData: Please enter the required trade data to start the calculation.

journal.title: Trade Journal
journal.noTradesYet: No trades in the journal yet.

emptyState.title: Your Journal is Empty
emptyState.description: Add your first trade from the main screen to start tracking your performance.

journal.noDataForStats: No trade data available to calculate statistics.

stats.profitFactorTooltip: Gross Profit / Gross Loss. A value > 1 means the strategy is profitable.
stats.expectancyTooltip: The average amount you can expect to win or lose per trade.
stats.avgRMultipleTooltip: The average profit or loss in relation to the initial risk (R).
stats.avgWinLossRatioTooltip: The average profit of winning trades divided by the average loss of losing trades.

seo.title: Cachy - Trading Position Size & Risk Calculator
seo.description: Cachy is a comprehensive trading calculator for position sizing, risk management, and take-profit targets. Optimize your trades with real-time calculations and visual analysis.
seo.keywords: trading calculator, position size, risk management, take profit, crypto trading, forex trading, stock trading, trading tools, financial calculator, trade optimizer
